execution_plan.description: Compute how many times each product appears in order items (order frequency per product).
execution_plan.query: SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) AS order_count FROM Order_Items GROUP BY product_id;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve product details (id, name, price) for products that appear in orders (results from step 1). The application will join these details with the order counts from step 1 and determine the most frequently ordered product.
execution_plan.query: SELECT product_id, product_name, product_price FROM Products WHERE product_id IN ($step1.product_id);
